CREDITS_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Calculates costs, bonuses, credits won, net profit, and VSR points for a specific race. Determines the minimum ranking to recover costs.
CREDITS_TABLE1_TITLE: Table of Costs and Bonuses by Economic Category
CREDITS_TABLE2_TITLE: Calculation of Ranking for Credit Recovery
CREDITS_TABLE3_TITLE: Calculation of Credits and VSR Points
CREDITS_GUIDE_INTRO_P1: This section is designed to calculate the credit prize obtainable in the final ranking of a race, based on its economic category. It allows for simulations, considering the race bonus and selected equipment costs, to determine the minimum ranking needed to break even or generate a profit in credits.
CREDITS_GUIDE_STEP1: Select Economic Category: Click on the column header (cat. 1, cat. 2, ...) corresponding to the race's economic category in the "Table of Costs and Bonuses".
CREDITS_GUIDE_STEP2: Select Equipment: Click on the cost cells of the equipment you plan to use in the "Table of Costs and Bonuses". When the total expense exceeds the initial bonus (visible in the "Calculation of Ranking for Credit Recovery" table), the "Effective Expense" and "Pos. for Recovery" (minimum ranking to recover the investment) will be displayed.
CREDITS_GUIDE_STEP3: Enter Extra Bonus: If there are additional bonuses, enter the amount in the "Bonus" field of the "Calculation of Ranking for Credit Recovery" table.
CREDITS_GUIDE_STEP4: Simulate Results: In the "Calculation of Credits and VSR Points" table, select the "Race Level (VSR)" and enter a hypothetical "Final Ranking" to see the corresponding "Credits Won"*, "Net Credits", and "VSR Points".
CREDITS_GUIDE_NOTE: *Note: The displayed "Credits Won" may differ slightly from the actual in-game values due to Virtual Regatta Offshore's specific rounding method.
CREDITS_AUTHOR_TEXT: Calculator by Velatopiano-La Casa di Hilde
VSR_SORT_HINT: Hint: Click on the column headers to sort the table.
VSR_GUIDE_INTRO_P1: This section allows you to store your race results and automatically calculate the VSR Points earned. VRCompass helps you monitor the validity of your scores and understand how they contribute to your VSR ranking.
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP1: Date: Enter the race's closing date. Dates can be found in VR's historical calendar.
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP2: Race Name: Enter an identifying name for the race.
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP3: Race Level (VSR): Select the correct race level from the dropdown menu. These levels correspond to the official VRO categories.
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP4: Final Ranking: Enter your final position in the race.
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP5: VSR Points: Automatically calculated and displayed by VRCompass based on the Race Level and Final Ranking (using the formula CategoryMaxPoints / (Ranking0.125), rounded).
VSR_GUIDE_DATA_INSERTION_STEP6: Click "Add Race" to save the result to your history.
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP1: Click the "Load from Race List" button. A list of suggested races will be displayed.
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP2_INTRO: Browse the list. For each race you participated in and wish to add to your history:
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP2_ACTION1: Enter your Final Ranking in the appropriate field.
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP2_ACTION2: Click the "Add" button next to the race.
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP3: The race will be added to your VSR history with points calculated based on the entered ranking. The "Add" button for that race in the suggested list will become "Already Added" and will be disabled.
VSR_GUIDE_LOAD_SUGGESTED_STEP4: To close the list window, click the '√ó' at the top right or anywhere outside the window.
VSR_GUIDE_INPUT_METHODS_INTRO: To enter your race results, you have two main methods:
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_INTRO: The table shows your races. Use the filter buttons:
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_FILTER_VALID: Show Valid for Ranking: Displays only races that VRCompass considers for your Total VSR Score (maximum 40: 2 Off-Category, 6 Level 1, 12 Level 2, 20 Level 3, selecting the best for each level in the two timeframes: <12 months and 12-24 months). Races are grouped by level and sorted by effective points.
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_FILTER_HISTORY: Race History (Update): Displays all entered races, sorted by most recent. Here you can edit or delete races.
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_FILTER_LEVEL: [Level Name]: Displays all entered races for a specific level (e.g., "Off-Cat."), sorted by most recent. You can also edit or delete races here.
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_ROW_COLOR_INTRO: Each table row is colored by VRCompass to indicate the time validity of the points:
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_ROW_COLOR_GREEN: Light Green Row: Race within 12 months (100% of points).
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_ROW_COLOR_YELLOW: Light Yellow Row: Race between 12 and 24 months (50% of their original point value).
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_ROW_COLOR_GRAY: Light Gray Row: Race not contributing to the Total VSR Score. This occurs for expired races (over 24 months) or, even if the race is not time-expired, its score is not high enough to be among the top 40 selected for the ranking (particularly visible in the "Show Valid for Ranking" view).
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_POINTS_STATUS_COL: The "Points Status" column (visible in "Show Valid for Ranking") indicates "100%" or "50%" for the points' contribution.
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_WARNINGS: Warnings: Races in the last 3 months before a halving (100% → 50%) or expiry (50% → 0%) are highlighted with a red left border. In "Show Valid for Ranking", the "Points Status" will include "(Warning)".
VSR_GUIDE_READ_TABLES_VSR_POINTS_COL: The "VSR Points" column shows the original points in "Race History". In "Show Valid for Ranking", it shows the effective points that contribute (100% or 50% of the original value, colored red if at 50%). The "Current VSR Score" (visible above the form) is always calculated by VRCompass taking these factors into account.
VSR_AUTHOR_TEXT: Ranking Management by Velatopiano-La Casa di Hilde
ANALYSIS_SECTION_OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: View the current status of your VSR slots and identify opportunities for improvement.
ANALYSIS_AUTHOR_TEXT: Analysis by Velatopiano-La Casa di Hilde
STRATEGY_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Optimize your VSR ranking by analyzing opportunities, weaknesses, and deadlines with a strategic focus.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_TITLE: How to read and use this chart for your strategy (based on 40 slots):
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P1: This pie chart is your strategic "health check": it illustrates the optimization status of your VSR slots, weighted by the maximum score potential of each category (Off-Category, Level 1, Level 2, Level 3). It helps you understand where you are performing well and where you have room for improvement to climb the rankings.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P2: Each race category is represented by a color. The total size of a category's slice (sum of "Optimized" and "Improvable" parts) reflects its weight on the total VSR potential.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P3_INTRO: For each category, the chart is divided into two segments that together represent 100% of that category's "health" potential:
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P3_LI1: The more intense colored part ("Optimized"): Indicates the current "health" percentage of the category. A high value here means the slots are well-filled with races whose scores maximize the potential of each individual slot (considering their 100% or 50% contribution).
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P3_LI2: The lighter colored part ("Improvable"): Shows the percentage of "health" still to be gained for that category. It represents empty slots or races with scores that can be significantly improved.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P4_INTRO: Values in the tooltip: Hovering over a slice, the tooltip shows:
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P4_LI1: "Slot Health" (XX%): Measures the efficiency with which you manage that category's slots (fill rate and average point quality). A high value is excellent.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P4_LI2: "Potential Improvement" (YY%): Is 100% - Slot Health. Indicates how much room you have to optimize the management of that category.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P4_LI3: VSR Points: Current / Potential (e.g., for HC: "18,500 / 22,500", for LVL1: "35,000 / 45,000"): Compares your actual VSR points with the theoretical maximum for that category. This maximum potential considers that half of the slots contribute at 100% and the other half at 50% of the race's base score.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P4_LI4: Percentage of Category Potential (ZZ%): Is (Current Points / Potential Points) * 100. Indicates how close you are to maximizing VSR points for that specific category, considering the correct potential.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P5_LI1: Low "Slot Health" (XX%) and low "% Cat. Potential" (ZZ%): Critical area! This category needs your utmost attention. You need to participate in more races and aim to significantly improve your placements.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P5_LI2: High "Slot Health" (XX%) but low "% Cat. Potential" (ZZ%): The races you've entered are good, but you likely still have empty slots. Focus on filling the missing slots with similar quality races.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P5_LI3: Low "Slot Health" (XX%) but high "% Cat. Potential" (ZZ%): Less common situation. It might mean you've filled many slots, but with non-excellent scores, even though overall you've already accumulated a good portion of the potential points. Try to replace the races with the lowest scores.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P5_LI4: High "Slot Health" (XX%) and high "% Cat. Potential" (ZZ%): Excellent work! This category is well-optimized. Maintain this level and look for any micro-improvements if possible.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P6: Interactivity: You can click on the labels in the chart's legend to show or hide individual slices and better analyze specific categories or states.
STRATEGY_PIE_CHART_EXPLANATION_P7: Objective: Use this information to maximize the "Optimized" portions and reduce the "Improvable" ones, thus approaching your maximum possible VSR score. The specific strategic suggestions you find next to the chart will further assist you in this task.
STRATEGY_EVALUATION_DESCRIPTION: Analysis of VSR slot opportunities and weaknesses with a focus on difficulty and intervention priority.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_HC_EMPTY_SLOT: Off-Category Opportunity: The contributing slot is empty. HC races offer many points. Participating in such a race is crucial for a competitive VSR. Identify the next HC race in the calendar and plan your participation. In the meantime, fully optimize Level 1, 2, and 3 slots.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_HC_WEAK_SLOT_BASE: Critical Off-Category Action: Your current result of {{points}} points is below the optimal threshold.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_HC_OK_SLOT_BASE: ‚úÖ Optimal Off-Category Status: Slot covered with {{points}} points.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_HC_IMPROVEMENT_ACTIO: Aim for a better result in the next available HC race.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV1_EMPTY_SLOT: {{categoryName}} Action: To optimize your 100% band, you should add {{numRacesToAdd}} {{raceWord}}. {{examplePointsText}} {{noteHalvingText}} This category offers a good balance of points/accessibility. Aim for solid results.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV1_OPTIMAL_REBALAN: ‚úÖ Optimal {{categoryName}} Status: Your 100% band is full. Any races approaching halving seem to be compensated by other valid ones. Monitor deadlines.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV1_WEAK_SLOT_BASE: Level 1 Action: Improve your lowest-performing result ({{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV1_OK_SLOT_BASE: ‚úÖ Optimal Level 1 Status: Slot covered with solid results (minimum {{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV1_IMPROVEMENT_ACT: Aim for a ranking of {{targetRank}}th or better to replace the lowest-performing race.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV2_EMPTY_SLOT: {{categoryName}} Action: To optimize your 100% band, you should add {{numRacesToAdd}} {{raceWord}}. {{examplePointsText}} {{noteHalvingText}} Useful for completing the ranking and adding "volume". Don't neglect it and aim for solid results.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV2_OPTIMAL_REBALAN: ‚úÖ Optimal {{categoryName}} Status: Your 100% band is full. Any races approaching halving seem to be compensated by other valid ones. Monitor deadlines.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV2_WEAK_SLOT_BASE: Level 2 Action: Improve your lowest-performing result ({{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV2_OK_SLOT_BASE: ‚úÖ Optimal Level 2 Status: Slot covered with solid results (minimum {{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV2_IMPROVEMENT_ACT: Aim for a ranking of {{targetRank}}th or better to replace the lowest-performing race.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV3_EMPTY_SLOT: {{categoryName}} Action: To optimize your 100% band, you should add {{numRacesToAdd}} {{raceWord}}. {{examplePointsText}} {{noteHalvingText}} The main goal is to have {{totalSlots}} contributing races. Even modest scores are useful.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV3_OPTIMAL_REBALAN: ‚úÖ Optimal {{categoryName}} Status: Your 100% band is full. Any races approaching halving seem to be compensated by other valid ones. Monitor deadlines.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV3_WEAK_SLOT_BASE: Level 3 Action: Improve your lowest-performing result ({{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV3_OK_SLOT_BASE: ‚úÖ Optimal Level 3 Status: Slot covered with solid results (minimum {{points}} points).
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_LIV3_IMPROVEMENT_ACT: Aim for a ranking of {{targetRank}}th or better to replace the lowest-performing race.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_IMPORTANT_DEADLINES_: Remember to monitor your races approaching expiry/halving. Replacing them promptly is crucial, especially if they contribute significantly to your VSR.

Deadline Priority: You have important races (HC/Lvl.1) undergoing {{eventType}} {{remainingTimeText}}. Replacing them should be a high priority to avoid losing valuable points! Check "Deadline Monitoring" for details.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_EXAMPLE_POINTS_TEXT: A {{targetRank}}th place could yield about {{points}} pts.
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_NOTE_HALVING_TEXT_SI: Note: one of your 100% races will soon be halved to 50% (see "Deadline Monitoring").
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_NOTE_HALVING_TEXT_PL: Note: {{numRaces}} of your 100% races will soon be halved to 50% (see "Deadline Monitoring").
STRATEGY_SUGGESTION_MONITOR_DEADLINES_TE: Monitor deadlines to maintain this level.
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_REBALANCE_: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (thanks to '{{beneficiaryRaceName}}' - {{beneficiaryRaceLevel}} re-entering the ranking).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_SIMPLE: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). Direct impact: -{{directImpactPoints}} pts. (Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts)
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_SIMPLE_NO_: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). VSR Impact: -{{directImpactPoints}} pts.
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_ENTERS_ON_: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). Currently not in ranking, but with this {{eventType}} it would become 50% and, if it then entered, would contribute approx. {{netImpactPoints}} pts.
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NORMAL_REBALANCE_: {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}) - {{eventType}} on {{eventDate}}. Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (thanks to '{{beneficiaryRaceName}}' - {{beneficiaryRaceLevel}}).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NORMAL_SIMPLE: {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}) - {{eventType}} on {{eventDate}}. Direct impact: -{{directImpactPoints}} pts. (Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts)
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NORMAL_ENTERS_ON_: {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}) - {{eventType}} on {{eventDate}}. Currently not in ranking, but with this {{eventType}} it would become 50% and, if it then entered, would contribute approx. {{netImpactPoints}} pts.
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_EXITS_RANK: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). After this event, the race will no longer contribute to your VSR. Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (loss of its entire previous contribution).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_URGENT_HALVING_EX: ‚ùóURGENT: {{remainingDays}} {{daysText}} left until {{eventType}} ({{eventDate}}) for {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}). Will temporarily drop out of VSR (may re-enter if slots free up). Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (loss of its entire current contribution).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NORMAL_EXITS_RANK: {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}) - {{eventType}} on {{eventDate}}. After this event, the race will no longer contribute to your VSR. Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (loss of its entire previous contribution).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NORMAL_HALVING_EX: {{raceName}} ({{raceLevel}}) - {{eventType}} on {{eventDate}}. Will temporarily drop out of VSR (may re-enter if slots free up). Net VSR change est.: {{netImpactPoints}} pts (loss of its entire current contribution).
STRATEGY_DEADLINE_ITEM_NOT_CONTRIBUTING_: (Currently not contributing to the current VSR)
SUMMARY_EVENT_ITEM_ADDED: Added: The race '{{raceName}}' was added to your history on {{eventDate}}.
SUMMARY_EVENT_ITEM_REBALANCE_POSITIVE: Rebalance: The race '{{raceName}}' expired/was halved on {{eventDate}}, but '{{beneficiaryRaceName}}' has re-entered the ranking.
SUMMARY_EVENT_ITEM_HALVED_IMPROVED: Year Transition: The race '{{raceName}}' moved to 50% on {{eventDate}} and entered the second tier ranking.
SUMMARY_EVENT_ITEM_REBALANCE_HALVED: Rebalance: The race '{{raceName}}' was halved on {{eventDate}}, but '{{beneficiaryRaceName}}' has re-entered the ranking.
SUMMARY_EVENT_ITEM_REBALANCE_EXPIRED: Rebalance: The race '{{raceName}}' expired on {{eventDate}}, but '{{beneficiaryRaceName}}' has re-entered the ranking.
SUMMARY_EVENT_IMPACT_TEXT_INCREASE: Net VSR impact: +{{netImpact}} pts.
SUMMARY_EVENT_IMPACT_TEXT_DECREASE: Net VSR impact: -{{netImpact}} pts.
SUMMARY_LOG_NOTE: Note: this summary shows events from the last {{days}} days.
VSR_CHANGE_MODAL_BODY: Your VSR score has changed from {{oldScore}} to {{newScore}}. This is likely due to a time-based event such as the halving or expiry of one or more of your races.
VSR_CHANGE_MODAL_BODY_INCREASED: Good news! Your VSR score has increased from {{oldScore}} to {{newScore}}. This might be due to score recalculations or a valid race re-entering the ranking.
VSR_CHANGE_MODAL_BODY_DECREASED: Attention, your VSR score has decreased from {{oldScore}} to {{newScore}}. This is likely due to the halving or expiry of one or more of your races.
VSR_CHANGE_MODAL_INSTRUCTION: We recommend checking the recent events to understand the impact on your ranking.
DASHBOARD_WELCOME_P1: VRCompass is your strategic ally for Virtual Regatta Offshore. More than just a sea navigation compass, it's a tool designed to help you better manage your game strategy, optimize your VSR ranking, administer credits, and plan your races with greater awareness.
DASHBOARD_WELCOME_P2: Here you can monitor your boat's status, analyze your VSR ranking, manage game credits, and plan your moves.
DASHBOARD_WELCOME_P3: Explore the sections via the navigation menu to access all features.
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_P1: Your data (boat name, VSR score, and race history) is saved exclusively in your browser (via localStorage).
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_P2: For security or to transfer data to another device/browser, you can export it to a file and then import it.
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_HOW_TO_LI1: - Export Data: Click the "Export Data" button (in the "Current Status" card) to download a file (VRCompass_backup.json) containing all your current data. Keep this file in a safe place.
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_HOW_TO_LI2: - Import Data: Click the "Import Data" button (in the "Current Status" card) to select a previously exported .json file. The data in the file will overwrite the data currently in the application.
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_THANKS: A special thanks to SailSmurf - LSV / Franck for his valuable collaboration in managing and updating the race list, making VRCompass an even more powerful tool!
DASHBOARD_USER_DATA_NOTE_P1: Note: After any changes to race data or general information (like the boat name), it is advisable to export the data again to ensure you have an up-to-date backup.
DASHBOARD_INFO_DISCLAIMER_DATA_MANAGEMEN: Data Management: This application saves the entered data (boat name, VSR score, race details) only within your browser's localStorage. No data is transmitted or stored on external servers. The user has full control over their data and can delete it at any time through their browser settings or by using the provided export/import features.
DASHBOARD_INFO_DISCLAIMER_ACCURACY_P1: Accuracy and Purpose: VR Compass is a helper tool provided "as is", without express or implied warranties regarding its accuracy or completeness. Its main purpose is to help you track and organize your VSR ranking, providing guidance for your future racing strategies. Calculations are based on known formulas. If you notice significant discrepancies, it might be a sign of a data entry error for one or more races, or a temporary discrepancy with the race closing date in Virtual Regatta (a situation that usually resolves quickly).
DASHBOARD_INFO_DISCLAIMER_ACCURACY_P2: Warning about non-VSR Races: Virtual Regatta Offshore occasionally organizes promotional races or special events that do not award valid points for the official VSR ranking. VRCompass, unable to distinguish these races, will calculate points for any race entered. It is the user's responsibility to ensure that the races added to their history are indeed part of the VSR championship to avoid an incorrect calculation of the total score.
DASHBOARD_FOOTER_RESPONSIBILITY_P1: Liability: The developers of VR Compass are not responsible for any data loss, damages, or other issues arising from the use of this application. It is recommended to use the export function to create regular backups of your data.
DASHBOARD_FOOTER_COPYRIGHT_P1: Copyright and License: The source code of this application is released under the terms of the MIT License, which defines its conditions of use, modification, and distribution.
DASHBOARD_FOOTER_COPYRIGHT_TEXT: © 2025 Velatopiano-La Casa di Hilde - VRCompass | Disclaimer & Data Management
